channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Who Is Friedrich Merz of Germany?
item.description: If polls are correct, Olaf Scholz’s successor could be the 69-year-old leader of the Christian Democratic Union. He is offering to get the German econ...

item.title: Killing of Russian General Sends a Message, but Doesn’t Change the War for Ukraine
item.description: Ukraine’s forces are steadily losing ground on the battlefield. The assassination of a top general in Moscow won’t improve their war effort, analysts ...

item.title: Suspect in Russian General’s Killing Detained Outside of Moscow
item.description: The Russian prosecutor’s office said the suspect, a 29-year-old citizen of Uzbekistan, confessed to planting the bomb on the orders of Ukrainian agent...

item.title: Jeff Bezos saved around $1 billion in taxes by moving to a ‘billionaire bunker’ in Florida
item.description: The Amazon founder saw an almost-10-figure savings by moving south.

item.title: Who Is Dominique Pelicot, the Man at the Center of France’s Mass Rape Trial?

item.title: In Syria, First Domestic Flight Since Assad’s Overthrow Lands in Aleppo
item.description: A Syrian Air flight from Damascus landed in Aleppo on Wednesday, as the transitional government tries to demonstrate its ability to run the war-shatte...

item.title: Bitcoin’s rally is nudging more luxury companies to make crypto a payment option—and sends a strong message to its younger clientele
item.description: Ferrari launched crypto payments on its ultra-luxury cars last year in response to demand from dealers and buyers who were also crypto investors.

item.title: Supreme Court to Hear TikTok’s Challenge to Law That Could Ban It
item.description: The company and its Chinese parent invoked the First Amendment in urging the justices to step in before a Jan. 19 deadline to sell or be shut down.

item.title: US says Pentagon is not behind mysterious drone flights
item.description: President Joe Biden on Tuesday night said “We are following this closely. So far, no sense of danger.”

item.title: ‘Murder Hornet’ Has Been Eradicated From the U.S., Officials Say

item.title: Slow Ventures is raising $275 million across two new funds: filings
item.description: The New York, San Francisco, and Boston-based early stage fund is run by Kevin Colleran, Sam Lessin, and Will Quist.
